Plot: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.
Title: Unstoppable
Actors: Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson, Ethan Suplee
tomatoConsensus: As fast, loud, and relentless as the train at the center of the story, Unstoppable is perfect popcorn entertainment -- and director Tony Scott's best movie in years.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 13 nominations.
